short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdVanish protects you from online advertisements, common trackers, and pop-ups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdVanish protects you from online advertisements, common trackers, and pop-ups. All ads known to the extension are blocked; there are NO "acceptable" ads. AdVanish protects your online privacy and eliminates advertising widgets on all sites. AdVanish has no ties whatsoever with any business entity, so has no need to make profit off its users, like other company-developed ad blockers do.
